Line1.F52ED: I'm sorry I wasn't able to say goodbye. The chorus of voices called to me, and I had to answer.
Line3.F52ED: I don't know how to thank you enough. You protected me, a girl you barely knew, from danger so many times.
Line5.F52ED: I promise not to waste this chance you've given me. I know it's not much, but I want you to take this as a keepsake. Truly, thank you.
Line7.F52ED: I asked Gulyas to return my mother's body to Zarbinzet. She only protested a little.
VoiceDir1.F52ED: You are narrating a letter you penned to thank the player for their help. Sorrowful, but purposeful.
VoiceDir3.F52ED: You are narrating a letter you penned to thank the player for their help. Earnest, heartfelt.
VoiceDir5.F52ED: You are narrating a letter you penned to thank the player for their help. Earnest, heartfelt.
VoiceDir7.F52ED: You are narrating a letter you penned to thank the player for their help. Thinly veiled amusement and appreciation at the second sentence.
